channel.title: motion on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in motion on Konigi

item.title: Motionographer
item.description: Motionographer is a source of inspiration for filmmakers, animators and designers. http://motionographer.com/

item.title: GRID In-Game Motion Graphics
item.description: Motionographer has some cool video of the in-game menus and motion graphics in RACE DRIVER GRID video game from Codemasters. http://motionographer.com/2008/06/30/real-time-motion-graphics-grid/

item.title: CGART: Video and Motion Graphics Showcase
item.description: CGART is an excellent new showcase that curates motion work covering the following areas: Motion Design, Animation, CG Animation, Cinematography, Special Effects, Interesting Advertising, Music Videos, Making of Videos, Movie Trailers, Motion Experiments. http://cgart.com/
